name: Park Tool RP-3 Snap Ring Pliers - 1.3mm Bent External
categories: RP-3 Snap Ring Pliers - 1.3mm Bent External
description: Installing them is hard. Loosing them is easy. Save yourself some snap-ring trouble and get the right tool for the job.Made of forged, heat-treated chromoly steel with a return spring and vinyl-dipped grips.1.3mm tips on bent nose blades for medium, external snap rings.
